Learn about our new Channel Manager, new themes and editing features, and advanced shipping June 2016 Newsletter Introducing the BigCommerce Channel Manager The new BigCommerce Channel Manager makes selling on multiple channels effortless. No matter what channel a sale comes from, you can process, fulfill and track it from your BigCommerce dashboard. Channel Manager currently supports the following channels, with more coming in Q3:
- Facebook Shop: Add a Shop section to your Facebook Page and showcase your products to more than 1 billion users. - Pinterest Buyable Pins: Let shoppers browse, pin and buy your products without ever leaving Pinterest. Get Started <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/introducing-channel-manager?utm_medium=email&utm_source=engagement&utm_campaign=june-newsletter&utm_term=&utm_content=channelmanagerarticle]]> Report: When, where, why and how Americans buy online BigCommerce and Kelton Research have surveyed thousands of consumers to produce a comprehensive look at the purchasing methods and influencers of the modern buyer journey. Read the full report <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/omni-channel-retail/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=engagement&utm_campaign=june-newsletter&utm_term=&utm_content=buyingonline]]> for valuable data that can help you build a winning multi-channel sales strategy. Optimize your shipping solutions — activate ShipperHQ BigCommerce offers you access to ShipperHQ, the leading shipping rate calculation and rules engine, right from your control panel. Get fully customizable shipping rates, multi-carrier support, sophisticated shipping tools and much more. ShipperHQ is included on Enterprise plans at no extra charge. All other BigCommerce merchants will receive a 30-day free trial. Activate ShipperHQ today <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/apps/shipperhq/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=engagement&utm_campaign=june-newsletter&utm_term=&utm_content=ShipperHQ]]>. Use the RFM model to power customer personalization In his blog post on the RFM model <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/rfm-model/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=engagement&utm_campaign=june-newsletter&utm_term=&utm_content=RFMmodel]]>, commerce expert and podcaster Kunle Campbell walks you through implementing a customer personalization strategy that tracks directly back to revenue. Industry experts weigh in on the state of omni-channel retail Watch our free webinar <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/How-We-Buy-Webinar.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=engagement&utm_campaign=june-newsletter&utm_term=&utm_content=grow-webinar]]> to see Internet Retailer’s Managing Editor, Kelton Research Firm’s President and the Senior Product Manager at BigCommerce offer their views on the newest industry report. New early access themes and theme editing features We’ve released 16 new early access themes <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/new-bigcommerce-themes-more-options/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=engagement&utm_campaign=june-newsletter&utm_term=&utm_content=stencil]]> that include features like sidebar navigation (Exhibit and Runway), multi-level categories (Exhibit), mega-navigation (Hero), and a unique homepage grid (Atelier). We’ve also added two new theme editing features: the ability to adjust the position of your logo, and the ability to resize images. The new editing features are currently on the Cornerstone theme, and will be added to all our new themes by the end of this month. Explore themes <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme-store/?utm_medium=eml&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_campaign=customers.junenewsletter.2016.Q2&utm_term=&utm_content=themes]]> See the BigCommerce Design Awards winners
After 6,000 social votes and an intensive review by our panel of judges, we’ve finalized our winners for the first BigCommerce Design Awards. Winners were selected for excellence in ecommerce design. They will receive a cash prize and be featured in the September 2016 edition of Inc Magazine. Visit our blog <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=engagement&utm_campaign=june-newsletter&utm_term=&utm_content=Designawardsmmerce.com/blog/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=engagement]]> on June 21 to learn more about the winners.
